EN.kVoteRandomEnabledDuration: Random teams have been enabled for the next %s Minutes

EN.kVoteRandomTeamJoinBlock: Random teams are enabled, you will be randomed to a team shortly.
EN.kVoteRandomAlreadyVoted: You already voted for random teams.
kMOTDMessage: * Commands: These can be entered via chat or the console (~)
* rtv: To initiate a map vote aka Rock The Vote
* random: To vote for auto-random teams for next 30 minutes
* timeleft: To display the time until next map vote
* surrender: To initiate or vote in a surrender vote for your team.
* acceptmotd: To accept and suppress this message
* stuck: To have your player teleported to be unstuck.
EN.kUnstuckMoved: You moved since issuing unstuck command?
EN.kUnstuckIn: You will be unstuck in %s seconds.
EN.kUnstuckRecently: You have unstucked too recently, please wait %.1f seconds.
EN.kSurrenderVoteStarted: A vote has started for your team to surrender. %s votes are needed.
EN.kSurrenderVoteExpired: The surrender vote for your team has expired.
EN.kSurrenderVoteUpdate: %s votes to surrender, %s needed, %s seconds left. type surrender to vote
EN.kSurrenderVoteCancelled: Surrender vote for team %s has been cancelled.
EN.kSurrenderVoteAlreadyVoted: You already voted for to surrender.
